After talking to ORTHODOX the first time: This is Agent Adams. I am currently inside the building what information can you give me?
If you're looking for the CEO, he's on the fourth floor. However, you'll have to get past the head of the IT department on the first floor.
Be careful though, most of the employees here are extremely loyal to the CEO. Getting to the fourth floor might be difficult.
Don't worry about me. Keep yourself safe and contact me with any new information you find.
To get to the second floor you'll have to get past the head of the IT department, but he won't talk to anyone unless they file a support ticket first.
I know there is a computer somewhere on the first floor where you can file a ticket, but I'm not sure where.
